DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect BYM338 muscle mass function Group III failure wean patient , compare placebo control .
DOC.brief_title: Study Muscle Effects BYM338 Mechanically Ventilated Patients
DOC.criteria: Adults mechanical ventilation least 7 day tracheostomy place > 24 hour . Expected survive least 14 day . Receiving adequate nutritional support , define least 20 kcal/kg 0.6 g/kg protein per day ( unless low protein intake require clinical status ) . Patients deem terminal wean patient . Patients progressive neuromuscular degenerative disorder . Patients comatose . Evidence unstable medical status .
